title: Seniors helpppp
content:
A genuine help needed, so basically I joined cse RR branch, I have taken partial drop for JEE, I now it's too hectic, but instead of asking why and all...

Please answer to this, I heard that JEE Advanced (Last sunday of May) and Sem 2 ESA are gonna clash.....is it really true or it will be delayed/or before JEE Advanced??? Considering we already are atleast 1month late for the sem 1.....

comments.body: It will be very hard to manage. Study well here, u can get good opportunities. You can get a good placement if u strive hard here only.

If your 2nd semester manages to begin by first week of January, then it will also end by mid May (or at most, the third week). However, if it gets delayed, so do your final ESAs. Regardless, May will be extremely hectic - you will either have ESAs or you will have lab exams and assignment/project submissions.
Why are you writing advanced? Don't you know that you're already in the IIT of Bangalore?
how is your jee prep as of now bro?

Yo bro ig i caught u. Ur not escaping to iit. Stay in iit blr.
Pls dont leave
Then it probably won't overlap with ESAs but it's going to be one stressful month

For those downvoting, go check the calendar outside your classes üôåüèª 
(Freshers)
Exams for your lab components of different courses. If you're in first year, you'll have lab exams for Python/C and Physics/Chem.
